title: New: The Japanese House – Still
body:
This stunning debut track from the UK’s **The Japanese House** is undoubtedly one of this years finest first outings.

With the sort of intimate atmosphere that helped make Lapsley’s early recordings so endearing, merged with a manipulated vocal not too far from Bon Iver’s sophomore LP, _Still_ showcases a unique songwriting ability, alongside an alluring grasp of raw human emotions. A devastating and otherworldly debut; immerse yourself in it below.
